title: What the fuck is taking so long with patching the game?
body:
Ever since the base MR / AR runes got removed, damage is fucking stupid in league.

**Global base resistance increase by 8 armor / 8 magic resistance**

Lethality stacking should not be a thing. 

**Lethality reduced, base attack damage increased**

Sorc boots and Ninja tabi are overruling every other boot type.
You're now a troll with any other boots.
**{{item:3020}} {{item:3047}} Price INCREASE by 200**


**CONQUERER - GRADUALLY increases AD, from 4 seconds to 2.5 seconds to proc.**

Keep COMPETITIVE ASPECT IN LEAGUE OF LEGENDS
**OFF-SEASON champions are now disabled in ranked queue, but are available in Flex**

{{item:3057}} Crit was nerfed, but sheen remained the same
**Sheen base damage decrease, COMPLETE item remains the same**

{{item:3153}} Completely shuts down all movement champions with NO COUNTER PLAY
**Active only speeds yourself up**

{{champion:157}} E rework into a dash (non-target). Resets going through wind wall and successful knock ups and on passive
(Still a bit cancerous but makes sense now)

If your last 20 games aren't within JUNE, don't comment you don't even play league anymore.

I do agree with many of those champs but I think some of those don't belong on that list. So I guess I'll make a list of champs that I think don't belong on the list.

Thresh: I don't really see why he is op, I think he is fine as is but he does too much damage if building full AD. That's not the design of the champ's fault but rather AD items giving too much AD right now.

Rengar: Same as Thresh, not really the fault of the champion but rather AD items give too much AD right now.

Illaoi: Same as Thresh, not really the fault of the champion but rather AD items give too much AD right now. However I do understand why she is on this list, she is a very hated champion.

Xerath: I think he is fine as is, I don't get why he is on the list.

Nidalee: I have faced a few games against Nidalee's. She seems fine, Yeah she does a lot of damage but she has to get close to you when in melee form and she does not have a good gap closer like other assassins. Sure she may be able to poke you with her spears, but that is very slow and she does not have cc to help that spear have an easier time landing like a certain other champ (Cough, Cough, Zoe).

Lol, no.

A bunch of those are not even over 50%, on top of not being oppressive.
